headline: BD Expands Peripheral Artery Disease Awareness Efforts with 'Love Your Limbs' Community Screening Initiative
summary: In recognition of Peripheral Artery Disease (PAD) Awareness Month, BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX) is shining a spotlight on a serious yet often overlooked circulatory disorder that restricts blood flow to the limbs and is a leading cause of preventable amputations.
